description: Ms. Markle, set to marry Prince Harry on Saturday, said in a statement, “I have always cared for my father and hope he can be given the space he needs to focus on his health.”
title: Meghan Markle Says Her Father Won’t Be Attending Royal Wedding
title_page: Meghan Markle Says Her Father Won’t Be Attending Royal Wedding - The New York Times
maintext:
LONDON — After weeks of media speculation, Meghan Markle confirmed on Thursday that her father would not be walking her down the aisle on Saturday at her wedding to Prince Harry.
Ms. Markle, an American actress, released a statement that suggested her father, Thomas Markle, was having health issues.
